name: Somezol 40mg infusion
description: Esomeprazole is used for treating GERD (gastroesophageal reflux disease). It is also used for treating esophageal lining damage caused by acid, as well as to avoid ulcers produced by NSAIDs and Helicobacter Pylori bacteria. This medicine belongs to a proton pump inhibitor class of medicines. This act by lowering the amount of stomach acid produced.
label: medicine
